entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 08 at 3:05PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND SNOW MELT WILL RESULT IN RISES ON RIVERS AND SMALL STREAMS IN THE CASCADES LATE THIS WEEK INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... An atmospheric river moving through the region will result in periods of moderate rain Thursday night through the weekend. This lead to rises on the Stehekin and Okanogan Rivers, which are already running high, due to spring snow melt.
